name: Path Blox
description:
A Puyo-Puyo inspired take to the puzzle genre, *Path Blox* is a game about using tiles that fall from the top of the grid to form paths that cross the screen.

CONTROLS:
Press Z to start

Players will use the left and right arrow keys to move blocks across the grid, and the down arrow key to move the blocks down faster.

GAMEPLAY:
The goal of *Path Blox* is to create paths with blocks that fall from the top of the grid. 
Paths will start from the left or right side of the screen and loop into themselves.

Paths can also end at an edge of the screen, including the bottom- this can be done for extra points.

At certain intervals, "garbage" tiles will fall from the top of the grid. To get rid of these, paths are made that lead into them.
